title: Jacksonvillie
author: Jacksonvillie
created_time: May 20, 2022, 03:17:25 PMLast edit: July 11, 2022, 01:09:07 PM by Jacksonvillie
content: Hi everyone, the faucet has gone through many changes and updates. Now the faucet runs stable.- Claim up to 10 satoshis per minute (base claim=6 satoshi)/15 daily claims- Faucet contest and Referral contest added. Everyone can earn much more by using this faucet- 50% referral commission for everyone.Faucet link: https://djfaucet.com/Solana faucet was added as well (https://sol.djfaucet.com/), it has the same feature as djfaucet, but only 12 daily claims are available. Join us and earn much more than other faucets. More earning options will be available soon. Please support me by visiting the faucet. It will encourage me to make a better faucet for everyone. Thank you.Besides, feel free to comment down below for any opinion about the faucet.

comments.author: limmurk
comments.body: Too bad the faucet runs with shortlinks, nost simple captcha...

comments.author: Jacksonvillie
comments.body: I'm sorry but without the shortlinks, the faucet will run at a loss and cannot be maintained for too long. The money paid by the ads network is lower than the funds I gave out

comments.author: Jacksonvillie
comments.body: Feel free to give ideas on improving the faucet. Your idea matters. Thanks
